pr_title: HIVE-22622: Hive allows to create a struct with duplicate attribute names

timeline.message: HIVE-22622: Hive allows to create a struct with duplicate attribute names

timeline.bodyText:
nit: Usually we use "field" for row types and "attribute" for struct types. Plus it reads more natural if we inline the attribute name in the sentence:
Attribute \"{0}\" specified more than once in structured type.
timeline.author: zabetak
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -471,6 +471,7 @@
           "Not an ordered-set aggregate function: {0}. WITHIN GROUP clause is not allowed.", true),
   WITHIN_GROUP_PARAMETER_MISMATCH(10422,
           "The number of hypothetical direct arguments ({0}) must match the number of ordering columns ({1})", true),
+  AMBIGUOUS_STRUCT_FIELD(10423, "Struct field is not unique: {0}", true),

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/common/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/ErrorMsg.java b/common/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/ErrorMsg.java
index cd913c02de..4ce2c52035 100644
--- a/common/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/ErrorMsg.java
+++ b/common/src/java/org/apache/hadoop/hive/ql/ErrorMsg.java

@@ -471,7 +471,7 @@
           "Not an ordered-set aggregate function: {0}. WITHIN GROUP clause is not allowed.", true),
   WITHIN_GROUP_PARAMETER_MISMATCH(10422,
           "The number of hypothetical direct arguments ({0}) must match the number of ordering columns ({1})", true),
-  AMBIGUOUS_STRUCT_FIELD(10423, "Struct field is not unique: {0}", true),
+  AMBIGUOUS_STRUCT_ATTRIBUTE(10423, "Attribute \"{0}\" specified more than once in structured type.", true),
 
   //========================== 20000 range starts here ========================//

timeline.message: HIVE-22622: Hive allows to create a struct with duplicate attribute names - address review comments
